item.description:
Welcome to the July Meeting of Boston Ecademy. I look forward to seeing everyone again on July 19th.

Agenda:

6:00 - 6:30 Welcome & Member Introductions
6:30 - 7:00 Speed Networking I
7:00 - 7:10 Pictures from May Meeting/Party
7:10 - 7:30 Online Networking Discussion
7:30 - 7:50 Speed Networking II
7:50 - 8:00 Next Steps

Non-members pay $12.00 per person
Members who RSVP pay $8.00 per person
Members who RSVP and brings new member pay $5.00 per person.

Please RSVP by 4:00PM of July 19th.

For more information, call me on my cell phone - 617-429-6571. Also, PHT is located on the second floor of the building at 500 Rutherford Avenue.

Best regards,
- Phil



For more information, see http://www.ecademy.co...
item.name: Boston Ecademy July Meetup
